mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with the correct use of a preposition: Adil saw some monkeys in the tree who were eating bananas., Adil saw some monkeys at the tree who were eating bananas., Adil saw some monkeys of the tree who were eating bananas., Adil saw some monkeys on the tree who were eating bananas.

options.a: Adil saw some monkeys in the tree who were eating bananas.
options.b: Adil saw some monkeys at the tree who were eating bananas.
options.c: Adil saw some monkeys of the tree who were eating bananas.
options.d: Adil saw some monkeys on the tree who were eating bananas.
